places.name: La Marquesa Golf
places.description: Beautiful 18-hole course with stunning views over the Costa Blanca. Suitable for all skill levels with well-maintained fairways and modern facilities including a clubhouse restaurant.

places.name: Vistabella Golf
places.description: Championship-level 27-hole course designed by Manuel Piñero. Features three distinct 9-hole courses and hosts professional tournaments.

places.name: Lo Romero Golf
places.description: Scenic 18-hole course in Pilar de la Horadada with Mediterranean views. Known for its challenging layout and excellent condition.
places.address: Urbanización Lo Romero, 03190 Pilar de la Horadada

places.name: Guardamar Beach
places.description: Long sandy beach backed by pine forests and dunes. Blue flag certified with lifeguards in summer. Multiple beach bars (chiringuitos) and excellent facilities.

places.name: La Mata Beach
places.description: Popular blue flag beach with a long promenade perfect for walks. Features beach bars, restaurants, and excellent swimming conditions.

places.name: Playa del Cura
places.description: Central beach in Torrevieja town with full urban amenities. Easy access to shops, restaurants, and the famous salt lakes nearby.

places.name: Mil Palmeras Beach
places.description: Quieter beach south of Torrevieja, popular with families. Clear waters and several good seafood restaurants nearby.
places.address: Playa de Mil Palmeras, 03190 Pilar de la Horadada

places.name: La Taberna de Formentera
places.description: Authentic Spanish tapas bar in Quesada town center. Family-run establishment known for its selection of traditional tapas and friendly atmosphere.
places.address: Avenida de las Naciones, Ciudad Quesada

places.name: El Pescador
places.description: Fresh seafood restaurant in Torrevieja harbor. Specializes in locally caught fish and traditional rice dishes with sea views.

places.name: Casa del Golf
places.description: Clubhouse restaurant at La Marquesa Golf with international menu. Great for lunch after a round of golf with panoramic course views.

places.name: Hong Kong Garden
places.description: Popular Chinese restaurant in Quesada with extensive menu. Offers takeaway and dine-in options with generous portions.

places.name: Indian Garden
places.description: Authentic Indian cuisine in Quesada. Wide variety of curries, tandoori dishes, and vegetarian options.

places.name: Torrevieja Salt Lakes
places.description: Famous pink salt lakes (Laguna Rosa) unique to this region. The pink color comes from algae and is spectacular for photography. Free entry and accessible by walking paths.
places.address: Parque Natural de las Lagunas de la Mata y Torrevieja

places.name: El Palmeral de Elche
places.description: UNESCO World Heritage palm grove - the largest in Europe. Beautiful gardens, museums, and historic center. Great for a day trip.

places.name: Santa Barbara Castle
places.description: Medieval castle overlooking Alicante with panoramic views. Accessible by lift from beach level. Museum inside and great photo opportunities.

places.name: Rio Safari Elche
places.description: Safari park with animals from around the world. Features animal shows, swimming pool, and picnic areas. Great family day out.

places.name: Aquopolis Torrevieja
places.description: Water park with slides, wave pool, and kids areas. Perfect for hot summer days. Open May to September.

places.name: Club Nautico Torrevieja
places.description: Sailing and water sports club offering lessons and equipment rental. Kayaking, paddleboarding, and sailing courses available.

places.name: Karting Quesada
places.description: Go-kart track suitable for all ages with different kart sizes. Fun for families and groups with competitive racing.

places.name: Quesada Market (Mercadillo)
places.description: Weekly Sunday market with fresh produce, clothing, souvenirs, and local crafts. Great for authentic Spanish market experience.

places.name: Costa Blanca Bike Rental
places.description: Bicycle rental for exploring the area. Road bikes, mountain bikes, and e-bikes available. Delivery to accommodation possible.
